tatami.core.agent.claim

Class SymbolTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.claim.SymbolTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SymbolTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Symbol table designed to support scopes. The main idea is to have a linked list of symbol tables, with the head being the current scope (in our case, the current behavior) and with the tail (in the direction of 'prev' being the symbol table of the most outer scope (which is the agent's scope).
    Author:
    tudor, Andrei Olaru
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getStatus

        public SymbolTable.VariableStatus getStatus(ClaimVariable variable)

      • get

        public ClaimValue get(ClaimVariable variable)
        get the value of the specified variable after a search to find it in the whole hierarchy of symbol tables
        Parameters:
        variable - - the variable itself
        Returns:
        - the value, if found (can be null, if no value is associated with the name present in one of the symbol tables), or null otherwise.

        Returns:

      • clearSymbolTable

        public void clearSymbolTable()
        Unbinds all the variables in the scope of one behavior. Useful after one execution of the behavior or before the following one.
